page.title: 10Attitudes In East Huntspill
page.content: We asked some people what their attitudes were towards East Huntspill. Some said it was a friendly place with nice small shops, and others said they liked the local country side. The people were then asked if they thought that the village could be changed in any way to make it better. Some said it could be cleaned up because of the amount of litter, and others said it would spoil it if it was made to big by developing housing estates. The Harvest Home held in September is the one village event that everybody seemed to look forward to. The new village playing field which was opened in July 1984 was the result of many years fund raising in the village and is regulary used by the villagers for recreational purposes.
